name: .FM3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .FM3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an FM3 file with FCEUX 2.2.0 or later by following these steps:
Load the game ROM you are going to emulate in FCEUX by selecting File → Open ROM
Open the TAS Editor by selecting Tools → TAS Editor
Navigate to the FM3 file and select it

Since FM3 files are also partially saved in plain text, you can also open and modify the files with a text editor. Keep in mind that you will only be able to modify parts of the data and that it may cause the file to become corrupt.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
